content: I'm officially starting my PhD study at UWA!
I'm starting a casual job as a lab facilitator for CITS1003 at UWA!
I've obtained an offer for the PhD program at UWA with a full scholarship!
I'm now working on [Starick](https://github.com/codersforcauses/starick), a volunteer project held by the CFC club at UWA.
